tool.name: ScriptManager: Merge Heatmap
tool.description: Merges two PNG files into a third PNG file that is an average of each corresponding pair of pixels from the input files.
tool.command:
ln -s '$sense' sense.png && ln -s '$anti' anti.png && ln -s '$output' output.png &&
java -jar $__tool_directory__/@JAR_FILENAME@ figure-generation merge-heatmap -o output.png sense.png anti.png

param.name: sense
param.label: Input sense file in PNG format

param.name: anti
param.label: Input anti-sense file in PNG format

tool.help:
**What it does**
Merges two PNG files into a third PNG file that is an average of each corresponding pair of pixels from the input files.
